text: Pterostichini is a tribe of woodland ground beetles in the family Carabidae. There are about 13 genera and at least 270 described species in Pterostichini. Pterostichus morionides ==Genera== * Abaris Dejean, 1831 * Abax Bonelli, 1810 * Cyclotrachelus Chaudoir, 1838 * Gastrellarius Casey, 1918 * Hybothecus Chaudoir, 1874 * Lophoglossus LeConte, 1853 * Myas Sturm, 1826 * Piesmus LeConte, 1846 * Poecilus Bonelli, 1810 * Pseudabarys Chaudoir, 1873 * Pterostichus Bonelli, 1810 * Stereocerus Kirby, 1837 * Stomis Clairville, 1806 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * Category:Harpalinae Category:Beetle tribes
title: Pterostichini
